options.content: Included appropriate review  /  maintenance  /  prerequisite, with clear format
Included inappropriate  /  no review  /  maintenance  /  prerequisite, and / or unclear format
Included appropriate objective, link, and relevance statement
Included inappropriate / partial objective, link, and relevance statement
Skill broken into clear steps, modeled skill, appropriate format, engages student
Skill broken into unclear steps or did not model skill, inappropriate format
Appropriate cue and pace, necessary prompts, sufficient # of examples, aligned to objective
No supervision or responses not directed, or inappropriate pace, or not aligned to objectives
Appropriate supervision / feedback, sufficient # of trials, varied examples, aligned to objective
Inappropriate supervision / feedback, or not aligned to objective
Generalized across materials, people and / or settings, scheduled practice opportunities, aligned to objective
Random or unpredictable practice opportunities, not aligned to objective
Followed format or script in written program  /  ETC
Followed portions of format of script of written program  /  ETC
Did not follow format and / or script in written program  /  ETC
Frequent eye contact and frequent scanning of group
Little or not eye contact and / or not scanning of group
Correct sequence included 90-100% of the time (attention, cue, pause, signal), signal only needed when appropriate
Correct sequence (see list) included 70-89% of the time
Correct sequence (see list) included less than 69% of the time
All components present 80% or more of the time
All components present a minimum of 50% and at least one component present 70% or more of the time (see list)
Ane or more components present less then 50% of the time (see list)
Praise / redirect ratio at least 3:1; praise rate appropriate for group  /  individual
Praise / redirect ratio of at least 2:1
Praise / redirect ratio less than 2:1
Consistently included frequent opportunities to respond and relevant combinations of individual / group / dispersed turns
Inconsistently included frequent opportunities to respond, and / or lacks relevant combinations of individual / group / dispersed turns
Inadequate opportunities to respond, lacks relevant combinations of individual / group / dispersed turns
Data recorded accurately and aligned to objective, information on data sheet complete
No data recorded or recorded inaccurately, data recorded does not align to the objective
